staxel.village.dialogue.Caretaker.line:1: Ah, ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;. I was wondering if you might be around.
Are you the one who's been leaving rubbish all over the village?
Um...no. Not me.
Definitely not!
I...might have?
Well frankly, I'm keeping an eye on you regardless...
And someone has to clean everything up. Perhaps this would be a good opportunity to show some goodwill?
I see you currently don't have a ^c:d03e37;broom^c:pop;.
That's definitely something we'll need to rectify.
You can buy one from the ^c:1486b0;local store^c:pop;. I suggest you do so at your earliest convenience.
Recently I've been looking for someone who shares my mindset. Someone who can sweep as well as I can.
How about you go out there and clean up this village? It's as much your problem as it is mine!
I've marked the rubbish on your map. Come back when you've cleaned it all up.
Still working diligently? Not quite ready to throw down the broom, I hope?
Do let me know once the streets are clean again.
A fair first try at cleaning.
Though I'm not sure how you missed the enormous mound of rubbish in the middle of the village...
Perhaps you could finish off the job and clean the rest of that up?
Something about that mound seems...off somehow.
I feel as though I've seen something that looks similar...
Please do clean it up soon. It's unsettling.
Aha. To be honest, I'm surprised you managed to clean up that thoroughly.
This will do. For now at least.
Consider this a sign that I'm moderately pleased with your work.
Do stay in touch. We might actually get along.
It keeps happening, ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;...
Three times now, I've swept the streets until they practically shone.
But again, rubbish strewn everywhere.
Do you still have your broom?
Perhaps you could make up for the mud you track everywhere by cleaning this mess.
I need to rest my back.
Ah, a fair job, though if not for my back I would have done it more efficiently.
You saw the state of my home...
I'm beginning to think someone is targeting me specifically...
This may not be our society's usual disregard for the environment...
Something far more nefarious is at work!
I need you to deliver this note to ^c:1486b0;Maximilian^c:pop;. He needs to know what is becoming of his village.
It would never have happened under my watch...
Oof. It hurts every time I sweep.
Yet I must still sweep. Who else will keep these streets clean?
You still haven't tidied up the rubbish I asked you to...
What are you waiting for? Take that note to ^c:1486b0;Maximilian^c:pop;!
Who knows what the culprit could be vandalising as we speak?
Ah, ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;. I was beginning to think you weren't coming back.
Not that it would matter, of course. I just want to confirm that my message was delivered.
Now, if you wouldn't mind...
I've been preparing a last line of defence in case the vandal returns.
These all come from my personal stores. Go forth and recruit me an army.
I would have you give one to ^c:1486b0;Aliza^c:pop;, ^c:1486b0;Rowan^c:pop;, and ^c:1486b0;Farm Fan^c:pop;.
Oh, ^c:1486b0;Leif^c:pop; and ^c:1486b0;Riah^c:pop; too.
Give those brooms to ^c:1486b0;Aliza^c:pop;, ^c:1486b0;Rowan^c:pop;, and ^c:1486b0;Farm Fan^c:pop;.
Oh, ^c:1486b0;Leif^c:pop; and ^c:1486b0;Riah^c:pop; too.
Ah, good work. Could've been a bit snappier, but then you do seem a little slow.
Perhaps this will deter the vandal.
If not...we may have to do something a little more extreme...
For your troubles, ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;. You did well.
-ish.
Shh!
This is very serious business. Keep your voice low.
I no longer believe ^c:1486b0;Maximilian^c:pop; is doing all he can to apprehend this vandal...
Perhaps...no. It's too much to suggest that he might be the vandal himself...
Regardless, ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;, I think it's high time I renewed my own political campaign...
But we can't do this alone! ^c:1486b0;Aliza^c:pop; knows how to build excellent ^c:d03e37;signboards^c:pop;.
I suggest you first go talk to her about that.
What are you waiting for, ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;?
I can hardly go myself. The others would start to suspect!
Ah, decent work, ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;. I trust she didn't suspect?
Now, I think a decent first batch would be about ten, wouldn't you say?
If you could make them and put them up around the village, I'll let you off cleaning for the day.
Still not quite enough of them around the village I'd say...
Perhaps you could put up a few more? Ten total should do the trick.
I saw my own face as I was sweeping one of the nearby pathways!
There certainly seems to be a good few of those ^c:d03e37;signboards^c:pop; around.
I might even be convinced to say you did good work today, ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;.
Now, there's one last thing that needs to be taken care of.
If you could deliver this ^c:d03e37;letter of challenge^c:pop; to ^c:1486b0;Maximilian^c:pop;.
That should officially start the process. Then we just wait a few days and see what happens.
This is the final straw, ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;!
Things have gone too far!
Every single one of my ^c:d03e37;signboards^c:pop; has been vandalised.
I'm...fairly certain it wasn't you. But don't take that the wrong way.
It's only because I know it must have been ^c:1486b0;Maximilian^c:pop;.
I need to think about our next move...
In the meantime, go clean up all that rubbish...
Not yet, ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;. I'm still thinking.
Go clean up that mess. It's making it harder to think...
What's that you have in your hand, ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;?
Is this ^c:d03e37;fairy dust^c:pop;? And you found it scattered in the rubbish?
Now that is unusual.
I hear you befriended a ^c:1486b0;witch^c:pop; recently...
Perhaps you could take it to her and see if she has any thoughts on the matter?
Well what are you waiting for, ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;?
You're keeping me from cleaning up the rest of the mess...
Is that... a letter? For me?
What is this awful odour? Did you pull this directly from one of those rubbish heaps?
Hm.
So there was no vandal? Just a ^c:1486b0;fairy covered in rubbish^c:pop;?
I knew it. I told you it was silly to think there was a vandal in the village!
They're all just naturally slovenly...
Now listen carefully, ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;. All your training has been for this moment.
I need you to take your ^c:d03e37;broom^c:pop; and go give that ^c:1486b0;fairy^c:pop; a good sweeping!
I know you can do it! Believe in yourself!
Just go, ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;.
You have to save our poor village before it's too late!
The ^c:1486b0;fairy^c:pop; sent a letter back, you say?
Well now, that's quite something...
Could you take a letter in response to—
Oh... She's already left?
I suppose I'll have to make do with sending one by post...
Thank you for taking the time to sort this out for me, ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;.
I appreciate the assistance. Not that I couldn't have done a better job myself, of course.
Try not to let it go to your head.
Oh, and try to keep the mud out of the village...
Or at least clean it up yourself as you go.
Perhaps you could convince me to help clean up your home?
It could certainly do with some tidying.
